content: you can help support more free patterns by purchasing the ad free written pdf pattern link to free tutorial is above & at the bottom of this description this is not your granny s hat the crochet hat gives you that vintage 1920s style if you always wanted to venture into crochet apparel then this pattern is for you this is a pattern is made in any worsted weight yarn this is an intermediate pattern video stitch and some instructional photos are included this is written in us crochet terminology caron one pound yardage 300 yards & 6mm hook feel free to message me with any questions or if you notice a mistake i ll be glad to fix it and update the pattern feel free to sell any items made from this pattern but please do not sell the pattern itself or publish it anywhere please also give pattern credit to littlejohn s yarn
